sentence.Network_en: Wile Charles was in prison; Sydney Carton had also arrived in Paris.
sentence.Network_cn: 查尔斯坐牢的时候, 悉尼·卡尔登也到巴黎来了.

sentence.Network_en: Can you care for my cat wile I am away?
sentence.Network_cn: 当我外出时你能照看我的猫 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: To the moment they have enough time to wile away.
sentence.Network_cn: 到片刻,他们有充足的时间欺骗离开.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文中的叠韵近义字_百度文库 ... guile 诡计 wile 诡计 cill 基石.
wily 老谋深算的wile 诡计, 阴谋, 欺骗surly 傲慢的；粗暴的.
今日词汇辨析 ... wick 灯芯，烛心 wile 诡计，欺骗，诱骗 weld 焊接，熔接.
新一81课单词句型速记掌中宝 - 日志 - 梦儿... ... willing 乐意的，希望的 wiling： 乐意的，情愿的。 dinner n. 正餐，晚餐.

list.abs: To attract by wiles or temptation ; entice ., 吸引以诡计或诱惑来吸引 ; 诱惑.
The little boy has many wiles ., 这个小孩有很多诡计.
he is really a wiling horse ., 他真是头老黄牛.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps from an Old Norse word related to vél 'craft'

means.word_mean: 1. the use of tricks to deceive someone (usually to extract money from them)
